content.raw: @chapulina caught a major bug with the model editor after this PR got merged: models made in the ModelEditor fall through the ground plane, which means they probably have collide_bitmask=0x0 or >0xff (even with the correct sdf branch). We are looking into it now.
content.html: @chapulina caught a major bug with the model editor after this PR got merged: models made in the ModelEditor fall through the ground plane, which means they probably have collide_bitmask=0x0 or >0xff (even with the correct sdf branch). We are looking into it now.
